author: fireflyshire
title: Cardano Eco-Village of the Future
description: There aren't enough places to experience the future of crypto & NFTs in everyday life, or that highlight Cardano as the green blockchain.
solution: A themed eco-village hosting Cardano community events, workshops, festivals, and retreats in the pacific northwest run on $ADA.
experience: 10+ years: operating an eco-resort, building, solar install, managing tech teams, event planning, education, and large-scale organizing.
